story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1101_0100_:
Looker and Diantha split up and jumped right into
Team Rocket’s two operation headquarters...
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_0300_:
Watch out, Paulo. We don’t know where Team
Rocket could be hiding.
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_0600_: Team Rocket won’t run or hide!
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_0700_:
I guess the disguises and getting found by Team
Flare were part of the plan—and just a
diversionary tactic!
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_0800_:
I also suppose you plan on protecting the secrets
kept here until the very end?
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_0900_: You’re only half right on that one.
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_1000_:
We predicted that someone would find this
hideout eventually...
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_1100_: This place is just a distraction!
story_teamflare_02_07000/2401_1001_1200_:
Since you decided to wander in here, I’ll have
you disappear!
